subject: Baseball
College Athletics
College World Series
lead_paragraph: The Southeastern Conference rivals Florida (53-17) and South Carolina (53-14) will play their biggest series yet when they meet in the best-of-three College World Series finals beginning Monday.
snippet: The Southeastern Conference rivals Florida (53-17) and South Carolina (53-14) will play their biggest series yet when they meet in the best-of-three College World Series finals beginning Monday.
